customer_addr:
408 Old Batow Lake Wales Rd
Bartow, FL 33830

citations.narrative:
The facility did not notify the USDA Animal Care office prior to moving their animals to a new address.
All addresses where animals are housed must be updated so that the animals and facilities are able to be inspected for
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days before any change in
address or location.
To be corrected by May 3, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The facility did not notify the USDA Animal Care office prior to moving their animals to a new address. 
All addresses where animals are housed must be updated so that the animals and facilities are able to be inspected for 
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days before any change in 
address or location.  
To be corrected by May 3, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
